articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The video advert shows a car chase that ends with two caramel-coloured cars on top of each other.
articles.title: Twix ad banned in UK for encouraging unsafe driving

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Wednesday's newspaper front pages largely focus on the chancellor's Spending Review.
articles.title: Newspaper headlines: '£39bn new build' and 'jobs slump'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Petrol bombs, fireworks and masonry are thrown at police in the same area where disorder broke out on Monday.
articles.title: Ballymena sees second night of disorder with missiles thrown at police

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: President Donald Trump's ambassador to Israel also told the BBC a two-state solution was "an aspirational goal".
articles.title: Huckabee suggests Muslim countries should give up land for Palestinian state

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The government plans to scrap the Vagrancy Act and bring in laws to focus on crimes like organised begging by gangs.
articles.title: Rough sleeping to be decriminalised in England and Wales

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Police say the gunman died, with the the country's interior minister saying he was a former pupil.
articles.title: Austria school shooting death toll rises to 11 after victim dies in hospital

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Experts say outdoor play in England has declined by 50% and are calling for urgent change.
articles.title: Ban 'no ball games' signs to get children off devices, play experts say

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A UN human rights panel says the deal "fails to guarantee" the rights of Chagossians.
articles.title: UN panel urges UK to renegotiate Chagos Islands deal

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The 44-year-old American singer says he loves the trend of fans dressing up as him on tour.
articles.title: Pitbull: Star says seeing fans dressed in bald caps is priceless

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The chancellor's focus on the NHS and defence will mean a spending squeeze elsewhere, writes the BBC's political editor.
articles.title: Chris Mason: Reeves's spending priorities leave little wiggle room
